localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
blogPost.body: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
blogPost.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Infracost是一个开源的云成本估算器，在拉取请求中。当你更改基础设施代码（Terraform）时，我们会在拉取请求中发布一条评论，告诉你对云计算账单的影响，例如 "这将使你下个月的账单增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉请求中的开源云成本估算器

localize.description: Infracost是一個開源的雲成本估算器，在拉取請求中。當你更改基礎設施代碼（Terraform）時，我們會在拉取請求中發佈一條評論，告訴你對雲計算賬單的影響，例如 "這將使你下個月的賬單增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉請求中的開源雲成本估算器

previous.excerpt: Lyne uses an advanced AI model to analyze each of your prospects their online profiles and writes a hyper-personalized introduction to them, which you can use in your cold outreach messaging.
previous.title: Lyne - Scale your cold email campaigns with AI powered intros

localize.description: Lyne使用先进的人工智能模型来分析你的每一个潜在客户的在线资料，并为他们撰写超个性化的介绍，你可以在你的冷门宣传信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驱动的开场白来扩展您的冷门电子邮件营销。

localize.description: Lyne使用先進的人工智能模型來分析你的每一個潛在客戶的在線資料，併爲他們撰寫超個性化的介紹，你可以在你的冷門宣傳信息中使用。
localize.tagline: 利用人工智能驅動的開場白來擴展您的冷門電子郵件營銷。
